message.content: {"given_definition_quality":98,"better_definition":"year","sentence":"今天是一年。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation-style scene showing a calendar with many pages flipping, with the final page saying '一年', surrounded by subtle signs of time passing (like fading sunlight, growing plants, and soft ruins in the background), warm and nostalgic color palette.","sentence_translation":"Today is one year."}
